Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I found... Mother... She's with Jane... They're... okay... Thank God...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Crowd', 3: "In the back! The back! A group of Corrupted! There's one in the middle! Oh god, what do we do?!"}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Don't shoot! Nanami, she's a... good child..."}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "She's a mechanoid! If a mechanoid is infected—"}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "No! She won't! She's fighting for us... Can't you see?"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Daddy... Mommy... Why am I... a machine...?'}
{2: 'Father', 3: 'You... were a subject in... a machine consciousness experiment...'}
{2: 'Father', 3: "We treated you like a human, nurturing you so you'd grow into humans like us..."}
{2: 'Father', 3: '"Won\'t grow tall if you don\'t sleep on time," remember?'}
{2: 'Father', 3: 'Nanami... Your father and mother love you from the bottom of our hearts...'}
{2: 'Father', 3: 'The time we spent together was real, Nanami... We are not a fake family.'}
{2: 'Crowd', 3: "Fire! Shoot them! They're coming! They're coming!"}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Evacuate the crowd! There's still one last flight in the nearby airport!"}
{2: 'Mother', 3: 'At least... at least... just wait a little more... please...'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: '...She can continue fighting, but we will not allow her to come near. And if she becomes a Corrupted, we will fire at her indiscriminately.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's okay, mommy... I... I'll continue fighting the Corrupted... and protect everyone..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But if I become a Corrupted... I wouldn't want myself hurting you all..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Goodbye, Mommy, Daddy. So long, and thanks for all the good times...'}
